title: What subjects should I choose in humanities in the 11th class? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you want to do after class 12th. But the best combination which I think as a former humanities student is this - English as the language compulsory History and Economics. You can choose between Political Science, Geography and Psychology as per what you like and what you dream of becoming! And I would certainly prefer to take Maths as your optional subject. I feel that Maths in class 11 and 12th keeps your analytical brain active and it helps you with all your entrance exams. If you have the option for sixth subject then choose another one from Pol science, Geo and Psycology. This is just my opinion, you should take subjects which you like and which may help you with your future aspirations.

The humanities stream for +2 level should comprise of English, your second language, history, geography,economics and if you have provision for opting either Political Science or Computer studies choose according to your interest. But keeping computer at this level is beneficial for future jobs. Best of luck!
